inclusion.criterion: spouse of woman diagnosed with breast cancer
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient's husband was recently diagnosed with colon cancer

inclusion.criterion: married or cohabiting for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: the patient is married and has been so for a long time

inclusion.criterion: English as one of their languages of choice
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: live within 25 miles of the University of Washington study center
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: the patient lives near the UW study center

inclusion.criterion: willing to give a sample of blood and/or sputum at time of first and second data collections
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: woman diagnosed with stage IV or recurrent breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met
met
exclusion.evidence: the patient's husband was recently diagnosed, but the patient herself has not been

exclusion.criterion: spouse and/or woman not able to read and write in English
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness. She lost interest in activities she used to enjoy.
